main event: On April 15, 1953, four reddish-orange objects traveling at a high rate of speed were observed over Tucson, Arizona.
interesting points: The objects were irregular in shape and disappeared at a high rate of speed., The sighting lasted for three minutes., Observers included four military observers., One observer estimated the object's speed to exceed 1,520 mph., The objects were noted to have a course of 345 degrees and an elevation of 30 degrees.
